# verify redirect block is generated when template calls another template that redirects

muxt generate
cat template_template_routes_gen.go
grep 'redirectURL != ""' template_template_routes_gen.go

-- in.go --
package main

func main() {}
-- template.go --
package main

import (
	"embed"
	"html/template"
)

//go:embed template.gohtml
var templatesDir embed.FS

var templates = template.Must(template.ParseFS(templatesDir, "template.gohtml"))
-- go.mod --
module example.com

go 1.25
-- template.gohtml --
{{define "GET / 200"}}{{template "redirect-helper"}}{{end}}
{{define "redirect-helper"}}{{.Redirect "/login" 302}}{{end}}
